name: NTELLECT - Casual Memory Game
description:
NTELLECT is a card-based MEMORY GAME with challenging levels. The best for your BRAIN!


Memorize the matching images, flip the tiles, and match the tiles together in pairs.
Remove all of the pairs before the time is over. Enhance your intellect. Boost your memory. Enjoy the nicest and richest image collection.



GAME FEATURES
Well-designed challenging levels
Arcade & leisure modes
Easy to play
Hint, peek, and x-ray boosters
In-game score bonus
Revive after fail
Autosave, continue playing where you left off.
Various image collections
Improves focus, attention, and concentration.



NTELLECT is the most colorful and sparkling game among the FREE MEMORY GAMES, especially the ones that have PAIR MATCHING game mechanics. It can also serve as an ATTENTION TEST. Everyone of all ages can enjoy MATCHING flipped images.
developers: CHEF GAME STUDIO YAZILIM TEKNOLOJILERI LIMITED SIRKETI
publishers: CHEF GAME STUDIO YAZILIM TEKNOLOJILERI LIMITED SIRKETI
